definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: This thesis introduced the whole processes of the development of the tobacco flavor management information system .
sentences.chinese: 本论文介绍了香精香料管理信息系统开发的全过程。

sentences.english: We'll toast to the New Year with a glass of bisho wine.
sentences.chinese: 让我们一起喝一杯加香料的果子酒，以贺新年。

sentences.english: After my noon run, I rushed to the market to buy a lot of different spices.
sentences.chinese: 我中午跑完步之后，马上冲去买一大堆香料。

sentences.english: No parabens, aluminum, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances or harsh preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 没有苯甲酸酯，铝，丙二醇，合成香料或防腐剂苛刻。

sentences.english: At times, kingfisher feathers have achieved the status of gemstones, silk, and spices.
sentences.chinese: 有的时候，翠鸟的羽毛和宝石，丝绸，香料一样值钱。

sentences.english: Deep violet-red wine, with ripe berry and spicy aromas.
sentences.chinese: 此酒呈深紫红色，散发出成熟浆果和香料的芳香。

sentences.english: Bouquet: Excellent concentration. Berry nose with vanilla flavours and complex oakiness.
sentences.chinese: 浓醇度，芳香带浓厚果味，有香料和烟的香气。

sentences.english: What is the fragrance used in the Artistry essentials productsearch. php?
sentences.chinese: 雅姿营养系列所采用的香料是什么样的？

sentences.english: Flavour and fragrance biosynthesis via bioconversion of specific substrates are described.
sentences.chinese: 记述了由特定底物的生物转化合成香精香料。

sentences.english: And later she would have a cup of hot coffee, coffee with cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 然后再喝上一杯热气腾腾的咖啡，加了香料的那种。

sentences.english: You can use your favorite spices when preparing your bentos.
sentences.chinese: 当你在做便当的时候，你可以用上你最喜欢的香料。

sentences.english: Full bodied, with sweet and round tannins, and a berry and spice aftertaste.
sentences.chinese: 酒体饱满，单宁圆润，回味中有莓果和香料的味道。

sentences.english: Never again were so many spices brought in as those the queen of Sheba gave to King Solomon.
sentences.chinese: 她送给王的香料，以后奉来的不再有这样多。

sentences.english: Add white wine to deglaze, then chicken bones, herb stems &water to cover.
sentences.chinese: 加少许白酒，然后放进鸡骨，香料和水盖锅。

sentences.english: Their supply of spices was well-nigh exhausted.
sentences.chinese: 他们的香料供应已经枯竭。

definition: nutmeg (Myristica fragrans Houtt)/mace/Myristicaceae (family of plants producing aromatic or hallucinogenic oils)
